categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: Border skirmishes with the New Separatist Union

Eleven months after the Battle of Endor in 5 ABY, the New Republic and the New Separatist Union engaged one another in several border skirmishes. Republic General Si-Flachitt provided a report on the skirmishes at a meeting with New Republic High Command officers.
The border skirmishes with the New Separatist Union were mentioned in Victory's Price, a 2021 novel written by Alexander Freed.
